BackstoryDef.title: duffer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: To make ends meet for [PAWN_possessive] family, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] siblings came out at night to steal cattle from nearby farms and pawn them off to a willing buyer the next day.

BackstoryDef.title: honorary impid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Having sustained harsh injuries while exploring a sprawl of desert ruins, [PAWN_nameDef] sought refuge in an Impid community, who imprisoned and nursed [PAWN_objective] back to health. [PAWN_nameDef] soon sweet-talked [PAWN_possessive] way out of [PAWN_possessive] dank jail cell and onto a patch of Impid soil where [PAWN_pronoun] grew exotic crops and trees.

BackstoryDef.title: moirologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional mourner. [PAWN_pronoun] lurked outside places of worship and mourning, offering [PAWN_possessive] services to the deceasedâ€™s family in exchange for silver coin or two. During the funeral, [PAWN_nameDef] would wail and weep for the deceased, making it seem that their passing was truly heartbreaking for [PAWN_objective], when in reality, it really made [PAWN_possessive] day, for [PAWN_pronoun] was much richer for it.

BackstoryDef.title: shill
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] partner-in-crime performed public scams to swindle money out of passers-by. This fraudulent lifestyle had its ups and downs, but came to a halt following the assault of [PAWN_possessive] partner-in-crime, causing [PAWN_nameDef] to spiral into a lifelong depression.

BackstoryDef.title: drunk
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Every ditch, gutter and hole in the ground was a bed if [PAWN_nameDef] was drunk enough. And usually, [PAWN_pronoun] was. Young satyrs and fauns threw pebbles and twigs at [PAWN_nameDef] as part of a game, but [PAWN_nameDef] was typically too inebriated to notice or even care.

BackstoryDef.title: barsong hero
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] sang songs of merriment, songs of joy, songs that others couldn't help but sing along to, to entertain the guests at [PAWN_possessive] village inn. The innkeepers gained so much business from these nightly sing-songs that [PAWN_nameDef] could have all the beer [PAWN_pronoun] liked, which was [PAWN_possessive] favourite form of payment.

BackstoryDef.title: tourist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With little more than the hand-woven satchel on [PAWN_possessive] back, [PAWN_nameDef] set out on a quest to travel across the globe and learn about other xenotype cultures. Now very educated, [PAWN_nameDef] wishes to pass on what [PAWN_pronoun] learned to other satyrs...if only they would pay attention.

BackstoryDef.title: fifer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] played the fife while [PAWN_possessive] battalion marched into battle. [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed so much bloodshed that very little can phase [PAWN_objective] anymore.
